p: Using different analytical methods Oancea et al., demonstrated that Populus nigra L. buds contain four volatile compounds (betulen, α, β and γ-betulenol, δ-humulen and α-caryophyllene), which have high oxidation–reduction potential. Essential oils in cosmetics have many beneficial effects for skin problems like: help to enhance the tissue tonicity, regenerate and rejuvenate the epidermis [ 59]. Although there are a few studies focused on the antiaging effects of poplar bud extract, this aforementioned one suggests that the vegetal product is a promising candidate for future skincare formulations.
